name: Stone Breaker
description: A completely new take on match-3 puzzle games, with stunning artistic beauty. Kick back and enjoy it! Forge your own forces and repel the invading armies of evil that threaten the seven kingdom's existence!

name: Demon Survival
description:
Defeat tons of creatures, learn new magic spells and face fearsome demons in this survival game with roguelite elements!
Demon Survival offers a level-based survival adventure where you must improve your equipment, learn new abilities and overcome different challenges to defeat the fearsome Lord of Hell.

name: Lost Pages: The First Cycle
description: Lost Pages is a game with a unique gameplay that features a completely new type of turn-based deck building system. It's unlike any other card game where you simply draw cards randomly and play them each turn by consuming energy.

name: Teddy's Marbles
description: Teddy's Marbles is an arcade platform game.

name: Toss King
description:
Toss King is a physics-based game. Just tap on the screen to drop a coin into the target. The more accurate and sweet the toss, the more levels you will beat.
You can play it anywhere, anytime. It's super simple to learn but hard to master! If you think you are smart enough and quick enough, give it a try; it won't be as easy as it sounds.

name: Uproot: Lost Leaf
description:
The life of a young mandrake is about to take an unexpected turn when he naively leaves the safety of his village. He is not aware of the dangers of the world, however, with great curiosity and an even bigger heart, he can surely surpass everything that gets in his way.
During his trial, Ygg encounters friendly mandrakes, sly rats, wise lizards and a space squid, but not everybody is to be trusted. His journey takes him far from the safety of his forest town, into the unforgiving wilds.
Help Ygg reclaim his special purple leaf stolen by the Rat King.

name: Union
description: Union is a minimal puzzle game about connecting shapes.

name: Caverns of Toros
description: Caverns of toros is an arcade platform game.

name: Dice Quest
description:
Throw your dice, build your kingdom and become a legendary warrior! In Dice Quest, you need to use both your dice, wits and luck to defeat the Dark Lord and his followers!
The local alchemist, Jasper the Wizard will grant you spells and arcane powers that will help you further along on your quest towards endless riches.
Through strategic and exciting turn-based battle, you'll need both skilful dice throws and magical powers to turn the tides of battle in your favour!

name: Delving Deep
description:
Delve into the depths of Mt Gorghul in your mission to unlock its secrets.
As either Rekkr or Thora Frœknhammer, the game’s dwarven heroes, you set out to track down your missing kin and Thrazoc’s legendary group of adventurers from within the labyrinthine Mt Gorghul.
Navigate your way through challenging maps, battle hundreds of monsters, complete dozens of quests, find and equip gear, level up your character, and increase your combat skills to aid you in tracking down your kin.

name: Piggy Run Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Ingenious Island
description: Ingenious Island is a point and tap tropical island adventure. Easy to play with ingenious puzzles.

name: Creepy Dungeons Heroes
description: Step into the dark dungeons of legendary monsters as the bravest hero ever known. Pick your favorite hero, equip with weapons, magic potions, legendary items and explore the hidden secrets of the creepy dungeons. Battle with the infamous classic terror monsters: Dracula, Frankenstein, Werewolf, the Mummy, and the Fish man, kill hordes of Zombies and fight with the mighty elemental creatures of Fire, Water, Wind, & Earth. Collect tons of gold, gems, loot & and discover hidden rare items.

name: Victory Day
description: Victory Day is a fun side-scrolling shooting game! In Victory Day, you play as a Soviet or as an American soldier during WW2. Your soldier heroically fighting hordes of Nazis. He has to defeat all enemies, he has to destroy Nazi leadership and to liberate the world from the Nazis.

name: Get Out! 2
description: Get Out! 2 is a lovingly crafted cartoon-style escape the room game, with over a dozen different screens, many MANY objects to pick up and crazy puzzles to solve.

name: Exo Pexo Dots & Diamond
description:
Dots the studious dog and Diamond the playful cat are enjoying some quiet time at home, until they receive a frantic phone call from the Curator at the Museum. The new Egyptian exhibit is due to open tomorrow but the most terrible thing has happened… the mummies have come alive!

Choose to play as Dots or Diamond and solve the mysterious case of the missing mummies by finding the Curator’s lost key and uncovering Scarab Jewels that have disappeared throughout the Museum… all before the exhibitions grand opening.
Discover clues, inspect objects, learn facts and interact with Museum staff to solve the mystery with fun challenges, puzzles and mini games along the way.

name: Vampires and Werewolves
description: Check out the latest Vampires and Werewolves avatar items!

name: Disquiet
description: Disquiet is a multiplayer co-op game (up to 4 players) where you and your friends became ghost hunters.The main goal of each mission is to identify and potentially exterminate the ghost using hunting equipment that is upgradable with experience points.

name: Motorcycle Racing VR
description: Motorcycle Racing VR offers the player a virtual motorcycle racing experience that is the next best thing to Racing a real motorcycle . The primary game mechanics is based on the player leaning his/her body to steer the motorcycle around corners. Race against AI riders.

name: Freedom Farming: The American Way
description: Farming with guns, drones, artillery, and super fast-growing crops! Plant, harvest, and sell with the full United States Military Arsenal at your fingertips! Your country needs you, Farmer!

name: Mearth II
description: Mearth II is a Action-Adventure RPG game. The game that is a part of the story Mearth universe. Join Princess Asteria, in her struggle to get out of the continent she is trapped in. Majestic places, ruthless monsters, dangerous roads, magical struggles, dark fantasy... Welcome to Mearth II

name: Mihirha's Legacy
description: A science fantasy Pixel Novel with arcade puzzles in isometric perspective.

name: Goalie Madness
description: Can you be in the right place at the right time to stop the puck? Cover your angles properly against increasingly strong forward attackers. They will skate faster and shoot a meaner puck as you climb levels. Unlock special moves and keep track of your stamina - you might need it.

name: Rocksmith: Fall Out Boy Song-Pack
description: Play "Sugar, We’re Goin Down", "Dance, Dance", “I Don’t Care”, “Thnks fr th Mmrs” and "America’s Suitehearts" by Fall Out Boy on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone accessible in AMP mode.

name: Malek
description: Malek: a story-driven, action adventure combining exploration with Hand-casting combat. Untangle the past as Malek, a young Fire Mage in search of the truth about his family. Learn skills and secrets along the way, Murgaz: The Middle Kingdom!

name: Hamster Playground: Spooky Hamster House
description: Spooky Hamster House DLC is the first expansion pack for Hamster Playground. Redecorate Hamster House in a spooky way and dress your Hamsters up in new costumes that would not be out of place at a zombie prom! Complete fresh quests and experience a new, deliciously witchy hamster job.

name: Perncops Virtual Rig
description: Take the gaming experience to a whole new level and bring your favorite PC games to VR, simply connect your HMD to your pc and immediately play your games without a need for game specific patches or mods through one of the virtual rigs to emulate racing wheels, yokes and game specific controllers.

name: Otherworld Legends: Uliana
description: Sin descripción

name: Mutant Football League: Diami Krakens
description: Diami Krakens DLC includes Diami Krakens team, arena and theme song.This content requires the base game Mutant Football League in order to play.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Enemy at the Gates Battlepack
description: Enemy at the Gates is a DLC module for the Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital series. It features a fluid, impulse-based turns, squad-level, and individual heroics, plus lots of armor and special rules to bring the fight for the city of Stalingrad.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Days of Villainy Battlepack
description: In March of 2011, Libyans in opposition to Colonel Muammar Gaddafi and his government took up arms. For eight months, the opposition, fighting under an interim governing body, the National Transitional Council (NTC), fought Colonel Gaddafi’s Loyalist forces all across the country.

name: Surrender
description: Someone want you to die, but your choice is your... surrender or roll ahead!

name: Train Simulator Classic: Taurus Mountains - Ulukışla: Yenice Route Add-On
description: Explore the thrills of a new territory as Turkey makes its debut in Train Simulator Classic, with AND Model’s breathtakingly scenic Taurus Mountains route!

name: S.T.A.R: Space Typing Action Rangers
description: A space themed typing tutor. Learn traditional touch typing.

name: Lawless West
description: Tower Defense strategic game with RPG elements about the cowboys in a Wild West setting

name: Explosive Track
description: Explosive Track is an intense action racing game set within a virtual gaming world. Competitors will complete to be the first to the finish line with powerups on an island set rigged to blow with the ultimate goal of becoming the season champion. Inspired by Split/Second and Blur.

name: Ruins of Istanbul
description: Ruins of Istanbul: A Tale of Curse is a VR Action Horror-shooter game. In post-apocalyptic Istanbul ruins, you have to stay calm, check your ammo and survive. With easy to play but hard to master mechanics, you will get carried away in Turkey!

name: Slumberer's Universe
description: Explore a strange and surreal world, uncover its mysteries and their cause while trying to overcome Alph's best friend's death in this psychological horror 2D RPG.

name: Space Fantasy: Anonymous Hero
description: The thrilling shooting game is now available on Steam! Manipulate the ""Hero who wishes to remain anonymous"" While mowing down the approaching mecha corps Defeat the mech army in high-speed battles.

name: Solitaire Noir
description: One more crime solved and so many more to solve! My head is heavy and the night arrives, all I want on this rainy night is to stay in the office playing Classic Solitaire!

name: Spartacus: Born to be Free
description: This game contains a set of puzzles themed gladiatorial fights of ancient Rome. Collect a picture from the parts at this level, and then unlock new levels and get access to new pictures. You are waiting for images of ammunition, battles in the arenas of gladiatorial fights.

name: Space Time
description: Space Time is a classic arcade style shooter with a modern touch. The goal is to destroy targets and achieve a high enough score before time runs out. There are 9 unlockable ships, 3 game modes and 3 difficulties.

name: Stack Stones
description: STACK STONES, a physics based multiplayer stacking game with multiple game modes. Enjoy playing alone to beat your former best mark or compete against others in funny multiplayer matches ... but watch out for your opponents, they want to smash your stack!

name: Squirrel Away
description: Squirrel Away is a handcrafted precision 2D platformer where you step up to help a squirrel couple to find acorn treasures from the mystery island based on a fable world. You have to be fast and precise while carrying acorns to the stump with the fear of time is finished.

name: Squid Fighter
description: This is a single/multiplayer swording shooting and fighting arena. You and your friends are invited to take participate in. People are divided into different 4 team, using your intelligence and action to get to know "who will survive?".

name: Supercrab Extravaganza
description: You play as Crabby the crab, Wielding your claws and magical pearls travel towards the depths of the ocean and save the world in this Metroidvania platformer.

name: Summoner's Survival
description: A survival shooter that gathers fellow to fight. Player simply performs the move key. Then the fellow will kick your enemies to the curb. Unlock achievements and add more fellow!The more your corps grows in number, the stronger it becomes.

name: Tales of Sabotage
description: An old-school style RPG set in the land of Thidruen. You must battle enemies, allies and uncover your past to find out who you truly are, and where you finally belong.

name: The Apocalypse
description: 《The Apocalypse》 is a low'poly style first person doomsday open world game. Survive in this world and build your own home

name: The Dreamland
description: This is a role-playing game, which mainly focuses on casual gameplay, such as construction, farming, fishing, and farming, and integrates a variety of combat elements and systems.

name: The Last Dungeon
description: The Last Dungeon VR is a tile based dungeon crawl. Explore the dungeon and solve all its mysteries and secrets.

name: The Family Castle
description: A 2.5D side scrolling, walking sim set in outback Australia. Play as a man named James whose childhood house has burnt down. He is walking to the house see if anything can be salvaged. Whist walking and talking on the phone to his wife the childhood memories come flooding in...

name: The Seekers: Survival
description: After a plane crash, you are the only survivor. You will quickly find out that you are in a remote place, surrounded by unknown creatures.

name: Throwing Master
description: Throwing Master is a casual competitive game played by two to four players, who make decisions based on the rules of the game and choose their preferred weapon to defeat their opponent.

name: Train Kingdom
description: This is a railway history simulation game.Set in the United States of the 19th century. Get a railroad network that connects cities in the pioneering America. Use locomotives to carry supplies, passengers, and get money through trade. Complete various quests and gain fame.

name: Traildown: Downhill Mountain Biking
description: Go as fast as you can, just on edge. Just you and your bike. Experience the maximum passion from riding and try to achieve the best time possible.

name: Unhackable
description: Unhackable is a first-person exploration game that puts you in the role of an anti-piracy system; cleans junk files, removes viruses and steals users' personal data. but beware because you will be the target of a group of hackers who want to open breach's in your system.

name: Uncured
description: Uncured, Unhinged, Unyielding. In this unique roguelike platformer, you slash your path through masses of infectious beasts, relentless constructs of steel, and corrupt militaries that stand between you and the antivirus. Begin your journey to the heart of the capital before the time runs out.

name: Umigame
description: Fight and survive as battle turtles in this cooperative dungeon crawler game. Explore and gather resources through procedurally generated levels. Unlock new skills and combine them with your ally to beat bosses in epic battles !

name: Vapor Run
description: Vapor Run puts you behind the wheel of armed and armored vehicles, racing through a cyberpunk wasteland alone or with a friend, delivering contraband, stolen merchandise, and precious resources. Make runs between rival corporations earning rewards, killing patrols, and advancing.

name: Waifu Desire
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Worms: Ultimate Mayhem - Single Player Pack
description: The Worms Ultimate Mayhem “Single-player Pack” features brand new additions to the existing single-player challenge modes, with 8 new single-player challenges, including Sniper, Jet Pack, Super Sheep and Shotgun challenges. The “Single-player Pack” also includes 1 new multi-player map and 6 new achievements.

name: Worms: Ultimate Mayhem - Multiplayer Pack
description: The Worms Ultimate Mayhem “Multi-player Pack” features 5 fantastic new multi-player maps for use across the numerous multi-player modes. The “Multi-player Pack” also includes 6 brand new achievements. 1 new Construction multi-player map - “Towering Infernal”1 new Medieval multi-player map - “A Hard Day’s Knight”1 new Wild West...

name: Grimfield Mystery
description: Grimfield Mystery is a Mysterious Action Adventure about a lost boy with a floating magic hand!

name: Gladiators and Glory
description: A Turn-Based Fighting Game Set in the Roman Era, where you can develop your Gladiators and fight them in arenas to increase the glory of your Ludus.

name: Future Daoshi
description: The future world is full of monsters and beasts. As a surviving Daoshi, you shoulder the mission of reviving the sect and saving mankind. Can you be the last hope for mankind in the siege of various monsters?

name: Fall Dice
description: One dice, one rule: Move the dice to match the number at the bottom of the dice with the Blue Tiles' digits.

name: Finding Fifi
description: A point&click puzzle game with a touch of Christmas.

name: Fiend's Archive
description: Investigate what happened in the village. Put the pieces together, find out what are you dealing with and send the evil creatures back to hell. First-person single-player horror game with an investigative story.

name: FireTry: Cars Pack
description: 21 new levels and 15 different types of cars are waiting for you. FireTry is even more fun with this dlc pack.

name: Firestorm: Deep Dive
description: Firestorm: Deep Dive is a first-person shooter survival game where you play as an elite member of Deep-Sea Diving Unit. Each player is equipped with K-78 Harpoon and the L-53 underwater Assault rifle to defend yourselves against the sharks.

name: Dark Adaption
description: Dark Adaption is a 5 player co-op scifi horror game. You and your team board a mining ship in distress, to identify and capture the alien organism, that has entered the ship. Work together to identify the alien's unique traits, to produce an effective tranquilizer and capture the alien.

name: Dark Tree
description: In a world where virtue considered a relic of the past, something is changing. Tormented by omen-dreams six heroes going to the distant kingdom of Hevalos. Fight hordes of enemies and the machinations of fate to uncover the secret of the Dark Tree.

name: Darwake: Awakening from the Nightmare
description: A 2D puzzle platformer set in a dark eerie world. Our melancholic hero Darwin, accompanied by a mysterious Owl, must find a way out of a maze by solving environmental puzzles and fighting spectacular bosses.

name: Code Red
description: Play Code Red for Free! A fast paced online arcade third-person shooter. Unlock the mystery of the enigmas and use chaotic abilities to gain the competitive edge.

name: Cmd Error
description:
You've finally awakened and are on the search for your creator, or anyone for that matter. Explore a simplistic world using the only remnants of a civilization: their technology.

Cmd Error is a puzzle game where you interact with the world through terminals. Each area that you explore tells a piece of the story of who you are. With a single command you can open a door, turn on a laser, or even start an old spaceship! Use the in-game map editor to create your own maps that can be shared and downloaded from the Steam workshop!

name: TuHou Remilia: Begin of Scarlet Family
description: Play as a powerful vampire and make your family stronger by doing the work of your men!

name: The Ranger: A Skyhopper Tale
description: Hunt down and kill twisted woodland creatures in this roguelite focused purely on the tactical side of combat. No gear, no min-maxing, just you and a ton of enemies. Each boss you defeat earns you an ability sapped from them.

name: Wars Across the World: Finland 1808
description: Finland 1808 simulates the conquest of Finland by the Russian Empire in its war against the Kingdom of Sweden. The Russian must take all of Finland while the Swedes must oppose hold out until the damage of the continental blockade imposed by Napoleon ruins the Czar's war economy.

name: Dark Desire 5
description: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.

name: Hook Escaper
description: Grappling Hook Guns in the air! HookEscaper is a high-speed 3D action racing game where you use a physics-based "grappling hook gun" to reach the finish line. Find your own shortcuts in different stages and aim for the fastest times! Find your own route and aim for first place in the world.

name: Dark Desire 6
description: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.

name: Nairi: Tower of Shirin - Deluxe Edition
description: This bundle includes the full game plus the 28 track OST DLC and art book DLC making the Deluxe Edition a must-have for anyone looking to relive the NAIRI: Tower of Shirin experience over and over.

name: Train Valley 2: Workshop Gems - Sapphire
description: Train Valley 2: Sapphire includes 57 new levels with a smart combination of different mechanics and train ages. Try to beat all the brain-teasing missions.

name: The Dungeon of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet of Chaos - Splat Jaypak's Arenas
description: Join the party as they are trapped by the sadistic owner of the Wheel of Misfortune. If they want to get out, they will have to shape up and fight through every ordeal their captor can throw at them. Are you ready to battle your way back to your adventure?

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - India
description: Puzzles of India!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Winter 2022
description: Puzzles of Winter!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Jellyfishes
description: Puzzles of Jellyfishes!

name: Laruaville 13
description: Our Match 3 games are unique! A new Laruaville series game with a new story, a new town and a ton of Match 3 Puzzle levels to play plus bonus games.

name: Fateel
description: Follow the journey of a crime detective who has been kidnapped by an unknown gang, and now he must solve the mysteries and find a way out.

name: Secret Parcel
description: Oliver was asked to deliver an envelope, with only one condition, he must not read its content. If he did so successfully, he would receive great fortune for himself and his family. How is it possible to transport an unknown package? What if he is sentenced to death himself?

name: Sonorous: Deep Down Below
description: Lost in the middle of the ocean, find the key to save humanity from an eternal life on the open sea in a continuous fight for survival.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: USA Route - Far Northern Mountains
description: Set in the northern regions of the USA, this fictional railroad through a steep mountain valley in a cold summer climate, and spruce forests. With steep gradients, you will be working your locomotives hard to travel this route, which includes 2 sessions.

name: Miyo TD
description: Love tower defense games? Try Miyo TD, a new open field tower defense game that allows you to make it your own by using your art or photos as towers and creeps! The game comes loaded with professionally rendered graphics with the option to swap them out for your own custom experience. Flip through your photo album for possibilities—then the Miyo TD battlefield can be yours! Use your custom heroes to blast through relentless waves of creeps in multiple challenging levels. If you’re looking for a way to bring some serious fun into your tower strategy games, look no further than Miyo TD!

name: Quaser One
description:
Challenging sci-fi resource management game!
You are on board the spaceship Quaser in this resource management game. You have to survive managing 5 different sections of the ship with limited resources until you reach your destination.

name: Beyond the Skies
description: Time to have fun!

name: Pride and Prejudice: Blood Ties - Collector's Edition
description: Telltale Games invites you to visit an alternate version of the classic Jane Austen novel in Pride and Prejudice: Blood Ties!

name: Rooms Within
description: Rooms Within is a single person psychological horror game and is based on the urban legend of backrooms. You play as a scientist who goes into a wormhole to unravel its secrets. You end up in a bizzare place. Now you have to figure out how to escape while surviving the horrors in the game.

name: Mirror Amusement Park
description: This is a never-ending game of chess played with patients who are modeled after characters from Alice in Mirror. Use your counseling skills to escape from the abandoned amusement park with your friends, treat the patients, and unravel the mystery of the gruesome experiment.

name: Star Devil
description: Star Devil is a Sci-fi Station Survival Roguelike Game with dynamic alien infection. Playable in both single player and split-screen co-op.

name: Lifespace Traveler
description: Lifespace Traveler is an action-packed, easy to learn, hard to master cyberpunk game where reality is split into dimensions called Lifespaces. No hand holding. No mercy. Fight your way and test your reflexes in fast-paced, brutal combat as you reveal the mysteries of an unforgiving dystopian world.

name: Dereliction: 2022
description: Dereliction: 2022 is a first person Co-Op Xeno-Horde Procedural Rouge-like. Fight through an endless world, against a swarm of alien bugs; the Dross, an endless enemy. They are vicious, but an overpowering arsenal will certainly help out.

name: Pocket Planet
description: Pocket Planet is a casual puzzle game where you build small dioramas by dragging and dropping tiles.

name: Tinker Pilot
description: Immersion-focused VR space sim. Use your motion controllers, HOTAS or your own custom cockpit and take full control of your ship.

name: Parapara Leloluv
description: Poor? Cheating boyfriend? Menacing stalker? With the power to traverse time and take some items back with you, what would you do?

name: Replaceable
description: The Pack presents Replaceable: a story-driven puzzle-action game about a robot designer and his creations who fight for their freedom by confronting a hostile A.I.

name: Park Control Simulator
description: Park Control Simulator is a parking space management game. Take care of cleanliness, improve the parking space and please the visitors. Are you ready to build and manage the most beautiful park in the city?

name: Field Tactics
description: Field Tactics is a Turn-Based Tactical War Simulator inspired by ancient warfare. Set up your formations, utilise a variety of tactics and lead your army to victory.

name: SpiriTales
description: As a new recruit to the Delta Expedition, you have to befriend and raise mystical creatures called Spirits to prove your skills in the trials of fire, become a full member and uncover the secrets behind recent mysterious events.

name: Missing Code
description: A man wakes up in an unknown office and doesn't know where to go. Discover the mysteries in this 2D Puzzle-Platform Game, with a tense ambiance and dark atmosphere.

name: Super Uriel
description: Keep one eye open! Super Uriel is back, and he is on a mission to defeat the Greedy Slime Monsters once and for all. Casually play and/or speedrun through 30 action packed levels. This video game is an exciting mix of platform and rpg. Prepare for ultimate game-play glory!

name: That Makes Sense
description: That Makes Sense is a puzzle game where you define the rules to solve puzzles. Challenge yourself to think in familiar and new ways to solve the puzzles in interesting ways.

name: Maximum Clearance
description: Maximum Clearance is an arena-style shooter that places action, chaos, and replayability at the core of its gameplay. Using an "isometric-style" camera, players control an 80-foot-tall mech to blaze a path of mayhem through destructible-filled levels modeled after real-life cities and locations.

name: Ricochet Blur
description: Ricochet Blur is a top-down shooter puzzle game that will challenge your vector calculations. Your goal is to successfully plan your further shots to eliminate demons.

name: Robox
description: Robox is an easy to play fast action, fierce fighting Robot boxing game, with breathtaking graphics that will make you want to play again and again.

name: Redeemart: A Convenient Apocalypse
description: Trapped in a convenience store with hordes of monsters waiting to devour you. You'll need to build weapons out of items in the store, collect trading cards to grow stronger and rely on the other people in the store to get over a heartbreak. Promising dual joystick action and a story like no other

name: Last Days of Future
description: In this single and multiplayer survival game, explore an unknown and hostile environment. Learn to survive by combining elements to craft your own items to hunt, build and defend yourself. Survive alone or with friends in this evolving post-apocalyptic world.

name: Herald: The Interactive Period Drama - Complete Edition
description: Herald is a choice-driven adventure set on colonial tides. Board the HLV Herald and uncover its dark secrets in an intriguing tale about tyranny and servitude.

name: Sentinel Point Heroes
description: A superhero themed, rogue-like deck-builder where you need to time your moves to counter the villain in turn-based combat. The game features a high level of variability where you can combine power sources and change difficulty settings, or use mods to make it your own.

name: Simulassword
description: A virus that suddenly appears begins to delete all the software and imprison people's minds on the computer in a simulation world. To get rid of this virus, you must save the world by collecting all the passwords and restarting the system!

name: Ruptured
description: Ruptured is a metroidvania where the world is split in two. Rupture between the two similar but slightly different dimensions to navigate your way to the source. Discover what broke this world.

name: Into the Farlands
description: Into the Farlands is a new Survival Hack and Slash experience set in a unique Mesoamerican inspired Dark-Fantasy Adventure. Fight waves of vicious monsters and meet interesting characters as you explore dangerous jungles, fetid swamps, waterfalls, ancient dungeons, and treacherous trails.

name: Tower Skydiver
description: A fast paced skydiving adventure game through different worlds, dodge objects, fight bosses and find your way through mazes to get to the end of the stages.

name: Qublyne Dungeons
description: An engaging retro vibe arcade to relax and overpass your achievements with every game. Pickup resources and use them to aquire physical and magical powers of your choice to defeat opponents while avoiding obstacles and traps in your path.

name: CyberBrick
description: CyberBrick presents classic brick breaker arcade action in a new re-imagined unique game where the better you are at staying cool and composed, the more points you will likely score.

name: Christmas Wonderland 7
description: Santa’s Awesome Adventure in Wonderland Christmas Wonderland is crammed full of fabulous Presents and Hidden Surprises with lots of Gorgeous Graphics and Puzzles for ALL the Family to enjoy. Find Golden Trees, get Game Rewards and Achievements along the way.

name: Little Big Horn
description: The intro to the Early American Wars series covers the historic battle along the Little Big Horn river in Montana in 1876 between the U.S. 7th Cavalry and the gathered tribes of the Sioux and Northern Cheyenne. While this topic is a bit smaller scale than the normal battles covered by the engine, it will still give you a good idea of how the overall game engine works so you can transition to one of our full games.

name: Panzer Campaigns: Rumyantsev '43
description:
For the Germans the Battle of Kursk was to be the premier summer operation in 1943, slowing the building Russian momentum. The battle was an Axis failure, and the Germans considered the operation finished by the middle of July.

For the Soviets, the early July battles were but the defensive phase of the Battle of Kursk, designed to wear out their German opponent. The Russian offensives that followed, first, Operation Kutuzov in the north, lasting from 14 July to 14 August, and Operation Rumyantsev from 3 August to 23 August were the culmination of the Soviet summer strategy.

Facing the Soviet Union's forces to defend Kharkov were the post Kursk, depleted 4th Panzerarmee and Army Detachment Kempf, soon renamed as 8th Army. Crisis both to the north at Bryansk during Operation Kutusov and on the Mius River to the south on the Azov Sea, saw the Axis forces at their weakest as the Soviets prepared to take back Kharkov in the fourth and final battle for the largest city in Eastern Ukraine.

In Rumyantsev '43, as the commander of the three Russian Fronts - Voronezh, Steppe & Southwestern, you have multiple armies at your disposal to defeat the vaunted but battered German Wehrmacht. As the German commander you will have at your disposal the still powerful panzer forces able to wreak havoc upon their Soviet foes. Included are scenarios that let you recreate all the major phases of the campaign from the initial German assault on the southern flank of the Battle of Kursk, to the culmination of Operation Rumyantsev, approaching the mighty Dnepr River. The stage is set! All that is lacking is for you to kick off one of the most significant campaigns of Summer 1943 on the Eastern Front!

name: Loppi Puzzle Magazine: Kangaeru Puzzle Soukangou
description: Loppi Puzzle Magazine: Kangaeru Puzzle Soukangou is a Puzzle game, developed by Game Studio and published by Success, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Dragon & Archer
description: Hunt animals, slay monsters, recruit dwarves, organize defenses, and adventure with your dragon in this crumbling land. Guard your base before being swallowed by evil creatures and find a way to teleport to a new world.

name: Pyrmd
description: Pyrmd, a Co-Op multiplayer horror game in an Egyptian pyramid, is played with one mummy and four survivors. Survivors must find the lost tablets and reach the door as quickly as possible to get rid of the mummy. The mummy must catch all of the survivors to win. Beware!

name: The Waking Knot
description: A unique, fast, musical tactics game. Watch yourself stay afloat as you hone your instincts. Use versatile tools to resolve emergent situations creatively. Find your rhythm in the chaos of The Waking Knot. “...Do you feel that? Everything entangled in one beautiful mess!”

name: Poly Shoot
description: A very simple shooting game. Destroy those colored polygons!

name: Counterspell
description: How long can you survive in this endless draw-em-up? Cast spells to defend yourself from the deadly warding glyphs.

name: DodgeBall World
description: Grab & throw unique balls directly at the face of your friends while dodging theirs in this FPS multiplayer game. Customize your own game modes, play in various maps & do the most insane trickshots possible in this brand new sport.

name: Delusion
description: With all the nightmarish creatures on loose, Find your way out of the Asylum and uncover a grisly truth in the end in this First Person Nightmarish Horror. Play as Derek Muller a construction worker trying to find a way out only for him to find all his nightmares come to life..

name: Veiling Mask
description: Veiling Mask is set in a mysterious world, plagued by war and elemental storms. The kingdoms are arming themselves for battle. In these troubled times, a hero appears, who wants to keep the world together at its core.

name: Merchant of Bohemia
description: Fast-paced trade simulation game with RPG elements. Choose your character, buy goods and wander around the medieval Bohemia to make profit. Don't forget to recruit some manpower to keep you safe along the way!

name: Defeat Everyone
description: The world she knew was really different. The Akai girl will have to go through numerous battles, learn the secrets of magic spells and get a chance to gain freedom. Adventure and danger, magic and dragons, battles and the desire to gain freedom, all this is combined in the game Defeat Everyone.

name: Ruinwaker
description: A Sci-Fi action adventure VR Game. Play in singleplayer exploring the story of a lost ancient power, or fight alongside friends in Co-op missions! Want something faster paced? Try PVP Multiplayer across diverse maps from different worlds!

name: RaLo
description: RaLo is a minimal yet mind-bending drumming game that requires mental agility and precise timing. Hit the correct drums at the right time, but watch out for when you need to do the opposite.

name: Horrifical Maze
description: Horrifical Maze Is A 3D Realistic Horror-Adventure Game.Travel Threw Mazes And Complete Missions, Survive, And Escape.This Game Contains Features That Most Games Dont Offer On Steam.Someone Is Coming For You (But Who?)

name: Trials of Cascadia
description: As the son of a farmer, Isaac had always dreamt of one day becoming a Paladin like the Chosen Hero, Zvarus. After a year of training, Isaac sets off with his sword and holy book alongside his friend to vanquish the forces of Darkness that beset the world. But not all is as it seems on the surface.

name: Furious Sword
description: Furious Sword - This tells the story of a mysterious vagabond who fights the forces of evil for good. He will have to go through many trials on his way and who knows how it will end. Explore a huge world, fight gloomy monsters.

name: Sweet Holiday Jigsaws: Trick or Treat
description: The Jigsaw Master Maker has rescued us from a treatless Halloween. Hundreds of fun colorfull puzzles to brighten things up around here. Chose number of pieces from 30 to 1024. An unique function to add extra non-related pieces into the picture to be solved. Full of excitement.

name: Beat Back VR
description: This game is a rhythm game in which you move your body and destroy flying magic balls. Blow away your stress with a powerful blow, and collect various cards

name: Puzzle Pieces 5: Fairy Ring
description: Go on a Wonderful Jigsaw Journey and earn Mana to reveal a Magical World. Enjoy this interesting puzzle images in this fairy adventure. Play 7 chapters with more than 250 HD levels. This game is 100% perfection, attention is paid to every detail, best in class. Enjoy!

name: Liberated: Enhanced Edition + NecroWorm Bundle
description: Experience action, quick thinking and fast reactions in this two-game indie bundle.

name: Clad in Iron Chincha Islands 1866
description: Manage your fleet and army, hunt the enemy's fleet, hide your weak squadrons in protected ports until reinforcements arrive, blockade enemy trade routes, amphibious assaults, struggle for dominance over the seas.

name: Celestarium
description: Celestarium, an astronomy game where you start as an amateur astronomer. Discover and map planets, sell data to corporates, improve your gear, start your own space agency, manage your own missions, build and fly rockets to discovered bodies. Explore, prosper and expand your presence in space.

name: Cat and Can
description: Sin descripción

name: Cartel Tycoon: Lieutenants Pack - Guerilla
description: “Guerrilla warfare is a war of the masses, a war of the people” - add more variety to your gameplay with these 5 Guerilla lieutenants each with their own unique Abilities!

name: Carpe Diem Project
description: You will find yourselves in an apocalyptic world full of enemies, which was created after an unsuccessful fight against a contagion that changed mankind out of all recognition. The streets are full of walking zombies that are hungry for your blood only. You have only one choice - TO SURVIVE!

name: Car Parking: New Cars
description: Take control of new unique cars!

name: Cambrian Dawn
description: Journey to a time long forgotten... In this thrilling underwater world of strange and beautiful creatures, only the strongest species will survive! Hunt for prey as the terrifying Kerygmachela, avoid danger using the diminutive Daguinaspis, or try and survive as one of the many species on offer.

name: Bunny Hop League: Map Pack 1
description: This map pack adds six brand new maps to your game! Two new ramping maps, Two new bhop maps and 2 new slide maps!

name: Bunch of Heroes: Holiday Pack
description: These holidays the zombies and aliens of Bunch of Heroes have been naughty, and Santa has a very special present for them: Hot Lead. Enter Santa, the jolly man from the north with his special Jollygun. Santa joins Agent Liu, Jared Joe, El Camarada and Captain Smith fighting for Earth's survival against the alien invaders and their zombie...

name: Bullet Destroyer
description: Destroy hordes of enemies and try to survive as much as possible. Bullet Destroyer is a first person shooter where you have to fight against hordes of enemies.

name: Broken Reality 2000
description: The sequel to everyone's favorite single-player adventure set on the internet about our digital lives.

name: Breathspace
description: Breathspace is an action-roguelike in a sci-fi setting.

name: Breach & Clear: Frozen Synapse Pack
description: The Breach & Clear Frozen Synapse Pack adds a new team as well as five new missions based on the hit game Frozen Synapse.

name: Booty Calls: Miyu Pack
description: The latest Booty Calls DLC introduces you to the sweet, innocent Miyu: a shy girl that dreams of giving her virginity to a man who will treat her like the princess she is.

name: Booty Calls: Lulu Furry Pack
description: The latest Booty Calls DLC introduces you to the playful Lulu, a kinky cat girl who will do anything to get her master’s attention. This fine feline loves fooling around, and never misses a chance to please her owner.

name: Booty Calls: Eve Pack
description: This very first Booty Calls DLC introduces your to the lovely Eve: a clueless (and extremely horny) babe who’s expecting a little bundle of joy.

name: Train Simulator Classic: BN Wagon Pack 01
description: This DLC is only available to purchase in the USA.This wagon pack contains a selection of 6 wagons themed around the Burlington Northern (BN) railroad company in the United States. The wagons included are:BN Gondola 65ft CoilsBN Gondola 65ft EmptyBN Gondola 65ft LogsBN Hopper 100t CoalBN Hopper Airslide 2-bay 1BN Hopper Airslide 2-bay...

name: Blazing Sails: Privateer Pack
description: Want to look like a well-equipped pirate hunting Captain? Then this is the pack for you! This DLC grants you the full exclusive privateer outfit and ship customization in 4 different colour variations.

name: Blazing Sails: Crab Lord Pack
description: Embrace your true calling as “Lord of the Crabs” via this epic crab-inspired costume set!

name: Blazing Sails: Conquistador Pack
description: Fit yourself out as a Conquistador through this “Age of Discovery” inspired armor set!

name: Blazing Sails: Barbary Corsair Pack
description: This exotic looking set of cosmetics is inspired on the Barbary pirates of old! The DLC contains 6 unique variations of the epic set and includes 2 different turban designs.

name: Blacklight: Retribution - Evacuation Pack
description: Dominate the opposition with some of the best items released in the Evacuation update. Scope and drop 'em with the one-shot Anti-Materiel Rifle, or set off your own fireworks with the Breach Loaded Pistol flare gun.

name: Birdcage
description: Shoot, Slash and Weave through bullets and enemies in this story-driven arcade shooter. Two giant fleets converge over the surface of the Earth. Pilot the HALCYON to prevent all-out war and the destruction of your Home. What is the value of a bullet when you wield a Sword?

name: Bavovna included!
description: Bavovna included! - a satirical, casual indie game in the Shoot 'em up genre with pixel graphics about Russian troops in Ukraine.

name: Beat the Heat
description: You have 10 years to make your territory sustainable or it won't survive the great heat of the future. Reap your harvest, solve typical problems of the zone and reinvest in the land in a strategic way to create conscience in your people about the necessary changes for their survival.

name: Bebok Invasion
description: Bebok Invasion is a 2D Platformer shooter with many different abilities. 36 levels of jumping, climbing, dashing and fighting against enemies!

name: BeeTheBest
description: Winter is coming and the Hive needs resources. Become the Queens' champion collecting pollen against the clock, facing the environment and sabotaging the other players. A Party-Game to learn about many astounding details of the bees while having fun competing with each other in a Quiz.

name: Bepuzzled Ultimate Jigsaw Puzzle Mega Bundle
description: Complete Bepuzzled Jigsaw Puzzles bundle! Safe and fun with 3 different sizes of jigsaw puzzle to challenge young and mature audiences! Over 900+ puzzles! Topics: Kittens, Puppies, Space, Animals, Nature, Sweets, Aquatic, Japan, Paradise! Need a relaxing time then this is the ultimate solution!

name: Bewells
description: Bewells is not exactly a classic three in a row game. You don't have to stack three identical stones in a row, but on the contrary, remove obstructing stones so that the stones that fall as a result form a horizontal or vertical row of identical stones.

name: Beyond the Gate
description: Loot two billion worlds beyond the Gate in this unique RPG. Features procedurally generated content, charged attack combat, distinct aesthetics, and a bittersweet story.

name: B.I.G
description: This game is based on puzzle strategy game where only player has less actions but a lot levels to move on.

name: Bigger Guns: Expansion Pack
description: Bigger Guns Just Got Bigger!

name: Battle of the Lost Continent
description: What's the secret behind my ring?

name: Battle of Britain, Norway and Atlantic
description: A real-time WW2 naval and air warfare simulation game on tactical/strategic level that features 18 scenarios covering Battle of Britain, Norwegian campaign and Battle of the Atlantic .

name: Battle Heroin Crisis: Heroin Pack - Satellizer Another & Cassie
description: A beautiful heroine [Pandora] who fights an unknown enemy that threatens mankind.BHC's additional Pandora character DLC appears! Join in the unique encounters and battles.Experience two new and exciting episodes!

name: Bad Santa
description: Bad Santa is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story is about the girl Florance, who broke up with her boyfriend. She hasn't had sex in a very long time. And for Christmas she asked Santa to come and fuck her! Her wish came true!

name: Battle Drones: Red Rock Resistance
description: Battle Drones: Red Rock Resistance is a 3D top-down drone shooter game set in a reimagined version of Red Rock, New Mexico. Upgrade your drone, improve your loadout and defend yourself against the ominous intentions of the A-EYE. How long will you survive?

name: Anvil
description: A medieval RPG game with realistic features, this is ANVIL. Create your character, incarnate a Templar or a Viking, help the people, honor the gods and may your legend be written forever.

name: Around Us
description: Around Us is a 2d party game centered around the childhood game “Hide And Seek” or also known as “Prop Hunt”. You can play among your friends where players are randomly selected to be a hunter or a hider.

name: Ascent of Ashes
description: A colony sim set in a post-apocalyptic dystopia. Build and defend your base. Manage your survivors. Engage raiders, aliens, Remnant soldiers and other factions in real-time-with-pause combat. Or use stealth to outwit them. Explore the massive world. Survive at all costs

name: Astoaria
description: A sandbox open world survival game where you have to exploit different islands ecosystems and climates. Survive, improve your technology, interact with local flora and fauna and much more. All this while trying to discover what happened to this world.

name: Atak
description: Atak is a real time strategy action game with fast paced battles and chaotic outcomes. Fight your way through the singleplayer campaign, challenge a friend in a custom battle or explore a multitude of minigames.

name: Attack Tactic
description: Attack Tactic mixes top-down turn-based combat with classic dungeon crawling for a unique strategic experience. Explore, upgrade, and fight as you devise clever plans to safely make your way deeper into hostile dungeons and through enemy territory.

name: Ancient Farm
description: Plow, sow, and reap. Sounds familiar? Not this time. Ancient Farm may not be the first farming simulator but it’s the first one to take you back thousands of years into the past, to ancient times where technology wasn’t nearly as impressive as it is today, but humanity was just as hungry as always.

name: Anarchy: Wolf's Law - Summer Adventure
description: This DLC pack contains: Free add-on: Change of season to summer + dynamic change of weather: sunny, overcast, rain, thunderstorm, storm, fog.This expansion allows you to experience all the adventures on the summer map. You can return to the original game at any time without losing the SaveGame!

name: Amber Time Pocket
description: Free world, a game simulating life, come! Let's experience life together

name: Alpha Terminus
description: As a member of the Special Raiding Forces, you attack alien bases as a Ball turret gunner in virtual reality.

name: Alone in the Outback
description: Alone in the Outback is a story-driven survival experience. Traverse through the Australian outback, survive deadly heat of the day and cold of the night. Stay hydrated and choose your strategy to survive the dangerous Australian wildlife. Explore the territory to find out why you are here alone...

name: Alkey the Brave
description: Alkey the Brave is an action adventure game with a focus on dynamic battles. Go through an exciting adventure in ancient time, fight hordes of thugs, struggle with cruel tyrants, gather brave warriors under your banner and defeat cryptic invaders.

name: Alive
description: Learn about humanity’s sin of greed in an escape room game where you play as Chris, a poor young man who looks for easy ways to get money but ends up in a virtual reality he can’t escape. Help Chris escape the rooms while uncovering the story behind them, and the man who created them.

name: Out of the ground
description: Strange things happen on a mysterious island, whence out of nowhere, evil spirits begin to crawl out of the ground and you, the greedy pirate "Redbeard", are sent to this island to figure out what's wrong.

name: Summer Puzzles
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Mining Factory
description: Can mine, can fight, and has sisters, collecting more than 30 types of ore such as iron ore, copper ore, manganese ore, chrome ore, vanadium ore, titanium ore, etc. Team up to break through the 100th floor

name: Boom 2020
description: A game to test your true ability in FPS shooters. Boom2020 take Revenge on the killers of your love Mona in a fast paced deathly shooter.

name: Nanali in another world
description: Nanali in another world is an action puzzle where you have to think about two dimensions at once.

name: Black Cycle
description: Consumers have power. A short walking simulator game that makes you think a little about how we normally consume.

name: Hentai Island
description: Travel to a magical island, become more powerful than you could imagine, save the world and let love and lust overtake you along the way.

name: Furries & Scalies: Super Scary Halloween Spooky Times Part II - Richard III's Tiny Terrors
description: Experience the wrath of tiny, killer teddy bears in this story content pack.

name: Cowboys & Zombies VR
description: Designed for Pico 4, Oculus Meta Quest 2 and Quest Pro PC-VR, Hands Tracking Mode. Cowboys and Zombies... What can go wrong? Prove that you are the fastest gunslinger in the old west by literally shooting with your bare hands. You have to be quick or the zombies will eat you...

name: Lost World
description: Lost World is a survival video game with single and co-op modes. Open world and first person view.

name: Lootem
description: Drop into a firefight, run over enemies, and explode your friends on one of the two wild islands! The action only ramps up as the zone shrinks and the enemies move in. Download Lootem and play today!

name: Repossession
description: Repossession is a 2D Action-Packed Shooter, with both Team Based Co-Op, and Deathmatch. - Either fighting their way through missions, robbing bank after bank or with each other. (soon) - they descend through Chaos for a Big Earnings and pay off the remaining debt.

name: Lucy's Heaven
description: Follow story of Iru to enter the dream world together. Where you can try out various of interactions with the dog, and recall memories of the past that you shared with your pet. This is a VR game created for people who have lost their dogs, who have been their family members for a ever long time.

name: Balldventure
description: The story of Mr. Ball going on a trip, With simple operation, Dodge the small and round Mr. Ball from all kinds of obstacles and structures and climb to the top. A difficult journey is expected, but do not give up and join Mr. Ball's journey.

name: Dynamic
description: Dynamic is an arcade style hand-ball game. Play against your friends online, or vibe out in single player where you'll test your skills.

name: Dear Friend
description: Join us on this psychological and spiritual adventure in which you will have a very special friend who will guide you to successfully face your greatest challenges.

name: Lims
description: Manage your lims to fight through the ring and reach the king. A sci-fi robot management game. Position your lims around your lam to fight through groups of enemies. Research, craft, and manage to succeed.

name: Orbital Clash
description: Turn-based space battle tactical/strategic game

name: Theocracy
description: Classic 4X turn-based strategy game, where you manage a theocratic empire, conquer and convert pagans and enemies by divine power or brute force, cast mighty miracles and enact dogmas. Advance and expand your theocracy into dominant world empire. And if necessary... release the Kraken!

name: Fish Bone
description: As you land on a planet filled with water, you must survive, explore the world, take on missions from the underworld. or even robbed You can choose your own style of play.

name: Party Park
description: Having trouble with your friends deciding which game to play? The Party Park will become your place of leisure among friends. Become a god and create your own world for you and your friends.

name: Wheel of Naughtiness
description: The Wheel of naughtiness is a casual hentai game that combines visual novels and interactive animations, experience love story with 6 girls. Unlock gallery mode to relive the good night.

name: Dream Clovers
description: Welcome to VR job experience!'Dream Clovers' is an educative game application supporting VR-based job experience contents.Recently there are two contents, firefighter and astronaut. More contents will be registered soon.

name: Iron Guard
description: A bite-sized pixel art tower defense game.

name: Moto Trophy VR
description: Take part in the motorcycle trophy. Upgrade your bike, win a lot of different races, and go! To the prizes, and much more to enjoy gameplay using your VR-headset!

name: Ferd
description: As a Viking warrior, you embark on a journey of vengeance through the magnificent Nordic landscapes of the Viking Age. With bow and arrow you defend yourself and your Viking comrades from hordes of attacking enemies.

name: Sex Teacher
description: Sex Teacher is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story is about two young senior students. Erika is writing her thesis about sex, but she has never done it! Her friend Aaron rushes to help her!

name: Catbusters
description: Catbusters is a multiplayer VR wave shooter where you blast hoards of evil vampire cats.

name: Look For Danger
description: An interactive novel puzzle adventure game

name: Keep Sheep
description: Match 3 sheep tiles. Join the match 3 adventure! Let's Keep Sheep!

name: New Hire
description: A horror job simulation game where you have to avoid the dangers lurking in the shadows while finishing your job and getting your paycheck.

name: Odin's Tea Party
description: 1-800-ValhallaIsCalling will you answer? Can you fight the horde and for how long? Cement your place within Odin's Tea Party to prove you have what it takes to beat the rest!

name: Omega Quintet: Mega Mic Pack
description: The Mega Mic Pack includes: Plushy Cat Paw Hammer, Avenger's Spear, Flying Fists, Mega Rifle, Angel Wing

name: Omega Quintet: Potent Protection Pack
description: The Potent Protection Pack includes: Rare Armor Set, New Protector Set, New Attachment Set

name: OMG: One More Goal - Basic Campaigns Pack
description: This pack contains two fantastic basic add-on campaigns, with new scenarios, obstacles and goals: - Grassland 1 - Tropical 1 This DLC finally completes the planned game's series of THREE basic campaigns

name: OMSI 2: Heuliez Bus-Pack Generation X17
description: After the successful debut of the French manufacturer Heuliez Bus as a DLC for OMSI in 2020, the French developer collective Acrotere Design offers you to discover the manufacturer through the first edition of the Access'Bus range as we know it today: the X17 generation.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol. 1 - KI-Fahrzeuge
description: With the new product series OMSI 2 - Download Pack, Halycon Media starts a new series of add-ons for the popular OMSI 2 - Omnibus-Simulator. In the first part, we provide you with more than 30 different AI vehicles for the existing OMSI maps.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol. 10 - KI-Busse
description: The popular OMSI download pack series with AI expansions goes into the next round. The 10th part contains varied AI buses that enrich every OMSI map.

name: Oil Rush: Tower Defense Map Pack
description: The first DLC for the unique real-time naval strategy game “Oil Rush” features a completely new tower defense game experience, including a tower defense co-op mode. Exploit new strategies with completely new technology tree, assault and defense units. The Oil Rush is never over!

name: Windhelm
description: Soar into the unexplored world of Windhelm, an open-world fantasy RPG. Fly through the floating islands as you go on a mighty quest to defeat monsters, clear dungeons, and battle perilous enemies. Survive the harsh elements with nothing but your wits and craftable items.

name: YAMC: Yet Another Minesweeper Client
description: Yet Another Minesweeper Client is here to evoke pure apathy from onlookers! Come play the newest reimagining of that game that comes with most operating systems.

name: Automata
description: Massive mutant creatures are coming at you, control your automata to beat them!

name: Sweeping the World
description: Sweeping the World is a mild rougelike game. The enemies come like a tide. You must survive and gain more powerful power! Combine the peerless power to stop all enemies! At the same time, use the spiritual stone obtained to refine yourself and become the most powerful immortal cultivator!

name: Alien
description: Alien is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story is about a guy who has been dreaming of having sex with an alien woman for a very long time. At some point, this dream comes true and the guy finally got an alien woman!

name: Against the Backrooms
description: No clipped through your ground, huh ? What a shame... Well get used to it ! You'll live in the Backrooms now. To summarize : run for your life, hide from the entities, and keep track of your surroundings, you don't want to get separated from your group...

name: Adventure Awaits
description: Adventure Awaits bucks the current trend of endless stats & dialog by bringing back the era of the Ultimas (Exodus, Quest for the Avatar, etc.) when RPGs were simpler and more approachable. The story, quests, and all maps are procedurally generated to provide endless replayability.

name: 5.5 Rooms
description: Yesterday you were at a graduation party, and today you find yourself half-naked in blood, handcuffed to the radiator. Find out what happened and try to figure out what to do with it next. Explore the strange apartment to discover its secrets in a meditative narrative dark adventure.

name: Lost August
description: 082192 is a single-player open-world walking simulator game based on the concept of liminal spaces and the backrooms. Experience a dream-like world through the lens of a VHS camera as you explore the contents of a recently discovered video tape.

name: The Work of Your Hands
description: The Work of Your Hands is a small-scale, deep, and relaxing open-world survival crafting game. You have no crafting screen or list of items. Harvest raw materials, create tools from them, build practical structures, and grow delicious food. You are in control of every step to live off the land.

name: Chain Detonation
description: Outline "Chain Detonation" is his TopDown 2D action game in which he has to defeat many enemies to advance. The purpose is to operate the player and defeat many monsters and bosses. There are a wide variety of monsters in each stage, and the game will be cleared by defeating the boss of all stages.

name: Ravyne
description: A classic roguelike, in which you must explore randomly generated terrain in search of a mythical artifact. Defending yourself from attackers in turn based combat along the way.

name: Phones Not Allowed
description: School is too boring? The temptation of using your phone is too strong? Be careful, teacher is watching you! Interact with and collect awesome anime artworks while keeping tabs of your teacher and classmates. Don't get caught or you will be suspended!

name: It's All In Your Head
description: 2D Side Scrolling Platformer with 3D isometric exploration elements

name: Volley Court
description: This is a 3D volleyball game developed by an actual volleyball team member. Whether you have ever played volleyball or not, you can enjoy the fun of this sport here. Support multiplayer online battle! You can call up to 11 friends and form two teams to battle.

name: My Darkest Witch
description: My Darkest Witch is a survival arena with huge waves of enemies caused by massive infestations of an unholy plague.

name: One For Two
description: One For Two is a very fast platform game, where the subtlety is that you control two characters at the same time. You must drive both blobs to the end of each level but be careful, if only one fails then you will lose.

name: Witches and Butchers
description: Witches and Butchers is a retro horizontal shoot-'em-up with RPG Elements. Control two characters at the same time, each one with their unique skills and roles, from a party that keeps getting bigger as you progress! Use the cooking system to enhance your character's skills and stats!

name: Spin Kick Ninjas
description: A co-op roguelike for 1-4 players with missions and levels that include classic gameplay of pinball, brick breaker, mini-golf and soccer combined with ninjas, stats, power-ups, and enemies. Build your clan, crush the darkness.

name: Darksite
description: Darksite is a first person single player horror experience. Explore different locations and find out where your friend went off to. Use puzzle elements, exploration and audio cues to reach the end goal.

name: Shuffle Tactics
description: Shuffle Tactics is a roguelike deckbuilding tactical RPG. Strategize to survive tough battles, pick the right cards to create powerful synergies, and bond with your sidekicks to get an edge in battle. Adventure awaits! Will you rise as Asteria's new King?

name: Neko Cafe
description: Design and build your business into the best café in New Neko City! Craft masterpiece sandwiches, manage employees, unlock upgrades and items to fully customise your café, win over picky food critics, and compete in cooking competitions!

name: Nicely Dicely
description: Nicely Dicely is a fun local multiplayer game based on physics, for up to four simultaneous players. You can decide, if you want to compete against all other players or in teams. Each player controls a player cube on a dynamically changing playing board.

name: See Ya Later!
description: Your ship crash landed on a randomly generated map, survive long enough to escape by crafting, mining, fishing, and farming!

name: Soul After
description: Sin descripción

name: Deep Sleep: Labyrinth of the Forsaken
description: What dreams are made of is the stuff of nightmares in this new point-and-click adventure. Delve deep into realms both fantastical and terrifying, and use the power of lucid dreaming to solve puzzles, explore, and contend with eerie adversaries in your search for the brother you thought had died.

name: Chess Royale
description: A non-standard chess game in which kings have magical powers. The player needs to cut down the enemy king, building a victorious tactics by combining the queue of moves and magical abilities.

name: Miami Hotel Sim
description: A hotel management simulator that you can renovate and clean up that set in Miami inspired theme

name: Wingy
description: Wingy is an adventure that takes shape in a vast open world that is fully explorable and rich in content. Engage in thrilling aerial battles, fight on the ground over floating islands and go beyond the borders of the known world to stop the war.

name: Reviver
description: Reviver is an adventure puzzle platformer game for two players, telling about mad scientist, parallel universes and the salvation of all things.

name: Gray
description: "Gray" is a first person, survival horror set around a Lunar prison colony, with a focus on story telling. Your oxygen is depleting as your mind is breaking. Can you smell the burning?

name: Isolation
description: Open world, multiplayer, zombie survival game where you battle the undead in a hostile environment. Explore the the hidden secrets of the moon and find a escape from the horrors that await.

name: Demolition Pro Online
description: Start up the demolition excavator and use realistic tools to take down the buildings! Work in a team of up to 4 players and master the challenges in different jobs. This 3D demolition simulation is based on destruction, cleanup and recycling.

name: Cuppy's
description: You work the closing shift for a new ice cream parlor, Cuppy’s, that has been having strange occurrences recently. Quickly assemble every customer’s favorite ice cream flavors and toppings before these… strange occurrences… get even worse!

name: Begone Beast
description: Begone Beast is a spooky top-down action game for 1-4 players. HACK & SLASH & SCREAM through hordes of demons, endlessly changing levels, and ancient terrifying BEASTS. Harness the power of SNACKS, FLASHLIGHTS, and FRIENDSHIP in this scary (but also cute) race for survival!

name: Prince Ajapanadam x Princess
description: Prince Anihonhiko, the prince from modern kingdom Ajapanadam alongside with his wife, princess Akorea-Aca from modern kingdom Akoreaeve got isekaid into medieval isekai world from their modern world. This isekai world got attacked by demon queen, Prince and Princess decided to save all princesses.

name: Natsukiri: Summer Vacation At Kirishima House
description:
Your decision can mean the difference between life and death.
A horror suspense novel with beautiful graphics!
